Name: Roll Over
Description: Deal 1 damage. If the Bear is awake, deal 1 damage to each enemy instead.

Name: Mark Territory
Description: Move up to two cards from your partner's field to your field.

Name: Hunker Down
Description:
Gain 2 vitality.
If the Bear is awake, the Bear performs their draw ability.

Name: Bear the Brunt
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 5 damage.
If the Bear is hibernating, gain 5 Vitality.

Name: Poke the Bear
Description:
Deal 5 damage.
If the Bear is hibernating, the Bear performs their draw ability.
